captions.text: >>ALL RIGHT, EVERYONE WE'VE GOT A LOT OF WORK TO DO
LOOK UPON THE FACE OF THE OPPRESSOR!

>>WE'RE FORMING A UNION TO HAVE A VOICE IN
THE WORKPLACE.
>>AND A SHRILL, HIGH-PITCHED VOICE IT IS.
THE WORKING CONDITIONS HERE ARE LOUSY.
THE AVERAGE TEMPERATURE IS NEGATIVE 45 DEGREES,
AND YOU MAKE US WEAR TIGHTS!
SANTA HAS ALWAYS PAID HIS WORKERS FAIRLY AND DECENTLY.
>>HE PAYS US IN CANDY CANES AND HOT COCOA!
NOW I'M LIVING WITH AGGRESSIVE TYPE 2 DIABETES!
>>YEAH, AND CINNAMON'S TEETH ARE ROTTING OUT.
IT'S LIKE STARING INTO THE ABYSS.
>>AND YOU WON'T LET US GO SEE THAT ONE ELF THAT
WOULD IT HELP IF WE HIRED MORE ELVES?
WE'RE PRETTY SURE SOME OF US ARE JUST CHILDREN
>>IF YOU'RE EATING FOR TWO THEN YOU CAN WORK FOR TWO.
>>WE DON'T WANT TO TAKE OUR WORK HOME WITH US, SPRINKLES!
JUST THINK OF HOW HAPPY YOUR WORK MAKES THE WORLD.
>>YOU MEAN THE 2 BILLION PEOPLE WHO CELEBRATE CHRISTMAS?
>>MOST OF WHICH JUST WANT HIGHLY COMPLICATED ELECTRONICS.
>>SOME OF US HAD TO GET ADVANCED DEGREES TO PUT
NOW WE'RE DROWNING IN STUDENT LOAN DEBT!
BUT REMEMBER WE DON'T MAKE TOYS FOR THOSE KIDS
THEY GET A LUMP OF COAL.
>>THERE'S BEEN A COLLAPSE IN B SHAFT,
SO WE'RE GOING TO HAVE TO USE DYNAMITE IF WE
>>I JUST DON'T UNDERSTAND WHERE ALL THIS ANGER IS COMING FROM.
>>THE CANDY CANE STRIPERS AND THE LOLLIPOP GUILD
>>JUST PAY THE ELVES FAIRLY, GET A DENTAL PLAN,
AND OUTSOURCE THE MORE COMPLICATED STUFF TO CHINA.
WHAT'S TO PREVENT ME FROM HIRING A BUNCH OF SCABS?
I'M SURE THOSE MIDDLE EARTH ELVES WILL WORK FOR CHEAP.
>>OKAY, OKAY, PUT A FOOSBALL TABLE IN
THE BREAK ROOM AND WE'LL THROW OUT THE DENTAL PLAN.
WHAT'S THE WORST JOB YOU'VE EVER HAD?
LET US KNOW IN THE COMMENTS BELOW.
SO YOU CAN SEE MORE OF THESE VIDEOS
THAT WE'VE LABORED SO HARD TO BRING YOU.

title: Santa's Elves Go On Strike - Studio C

comments.text:
This is socialist propaganda!  Unions!  Minimum wage?  Health care? Student 
Loan relief!? What is this, an advertisement for the Democratic Party 
platform? How am I supposed to maintain my testimony and consider the needs 
of my fellow humans at the same time?  At least they advocated for a good 
solid free market solution like importing all the "complicated" 
(potentially high paying and career making) work to China.  Mitt would be 
proud of that one.  ﻿

comments.author: Rachel Kate

comments.text:
Worst  job  I  ever  had  was  as  a  Publix  bagger,  which  is  their  
way  of  saying  do  whatever  else  happens  to  need  to  be  done.  On  
my  feet  the  whole  shift,  and  the  job  was  so  repetitive  that  I  
actually  had  a  couple  dreams  I  was  still  doing  it.  And  on  top  
of  that,  the  higher  ups  pretty  much  rewrote  the  job  a  couple  
times,  and  my  manager,  who  would  pay  lip  service  to  the  rules  
that  made  no  sense  but  wouldn't  enforce  them,  got  transfered,  
the  new  manager  calling  me  out  every  I  couldn't  do  some  stupid  
policy  that  required  us  to  try  and  take  the  carts  out  for  the  
customer  instead  of  just  offering  to  do  it.  If  there  is  a  
purse,  or  even  more  so,  a  child  in  that  cart,  I'm  not  touching  
it  without  permission.﻿
